CustomField.formula: IF(((ISPICKVAL(OrderLineType__c, "Regular") && IsRegularOrderPossible__c = false) || (ISPICKVAL(OrderLineType__c, "InspectionCopy") && IsInspectionCopyOrderPossible__c = false) || (ISPICKVAL(OrderLineType__c, "UseCopy") && IsUseCopyOrderPossible__c = false)),1,0)
CustomField.label: Validate OrderLineTypeCheck
